values: To sacrifice is to give up something in order to get something you want or do something else for someone.
Karen has had to sacrifice a lot for her children.
n. something given up or lost 牺牲
n. 牺牲；祭品；供奉 vt. 牺牲；献祭；亏本出售 vi. 献祭；奉献
n. 牺牲, 舍身献祭, 供奉祭品
